PERSONA.NAME: Roderick
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The elder son of Duke Angelo, brother to Henriquez.

PERSONA.NAME: Henriquez
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The younger son of Duke Angelo, brother to Roderick, suitor to Violante and Leonora

PERSONA.NAME: Don Bernard
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Father to Leonora, wants her to marry Henriquez

PERSONA.NAME: Camillo
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Father to Julio, tries to arrange the marriage of Julio and Leonora.

PERSONA.NAME: Julio
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Camillo, in love with Leonora, later goes mad.

PERSONA.NAME: Citizen
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A citizen of Andalusia, a messenger

PERSONA.NAME: Master of the Flocks
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A local shepherd, a brute, discovers Violante is in disguise

PERSONA.NAME: Servant to Violante
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Helps Violante disguise herself as a shepherd’s boy.

PERSONA.NAME: Leonora
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to Don Bernard, in love with Julio against her father’s wishes

PERSONA.NAME: Violante
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: In love with Henriquez, later disguised as Florio
